entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Bella Coola
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:57 AM PST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Drizzle and Fog, 3.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bella Coola Airport 08:00 AM PST Friday 27 January 2023
Condition: Drizzle and Fog
Temperature: 3.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.9 kPa rising
Visibility: 0.8 km
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 3.3°C
Wind: NE 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature steady near plus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Temperature steady near plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then 30 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing in the morning. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 27 January 2023
